1528116214_16CWdkXYYRnpct8GYS7GgD6yFcJHP.body: Add zeronet to group "$tor_user" by command "usermod -a -G $tor_user zeronet" or something like that.

1528298428_14aByczNBeonC9sGu66hVrUt1Rm3J.body: Whe you acces https://check.torproject.org/, it confirms your browser using Tor. Zeronet is not a browser. Zeronet is application, which can use tor or not.
